alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 11:44AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Marin County through 1230 PM PST... At 1144 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southwest of Stinson Beach, or 23 miles southwest of San Rafael, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Rafael, Novato, Mill Valley, San Anselmo, Larkspur, Corte Madera, Tiburon, Fairfax, Sausalito, San Geronimo, Kentfield, Lucas Valley-Marinwood, Black Point-Green Point, Tamalpais-Homestead, Strawberry, Muir Beach, Tamalpais-Homestead Valley, Stinson Beach, Ross and Belvedere. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Valleys
